Tracker 1.9 Minecraft Map
1.9竞技（PVP）

15w31a+





特点.gif (3.91 KB, 下载次数: 14)

下载附件

2015-9-9 04:46 上传






英文原文


Tracker is a Minecraft Minigame for 1.9 for 2-4 players where the name is the objective. There is a Hunter and 3 Runners. The runners are invisible and have particles near the feat and in the map you choose the Hunter will have to track them down and kill them.
First thing is to choose how you are, step on one of the 4 pressure plates in spawn, they all have signs to tell you what you'r going to be.
Secondly, you have to choose your particles, which will be on the feat of the Runners.
Thirdly, you'll have to choose your map, there are 4 maps in total and we are still working hard to make more.
Fourthly, youll be teleported to the map you chose. The hunter will have blindness and slowness for about 5 seconds which will give the runners time to run away. The hunter has 3 minutes to try kill all the runners and if he dosn't the hunters win and if he succeeds then he wins. When a runner dies he has 2 options. go back to spawn or spectate game.
If there are any bugs around please leave them in the comments.
Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/5z5v6klauo6u6jt/Tracker Minecraft 1.9 Map.7z

汉化版：
这个地图支持2-4个玩家游玩，玩家们可以自己选择
成为追杀者或者是求生者，求生者是不可见的。

游戏步骤：
 第一 玩家们分别站在压力板上，他会告诉你你是什么角色第二你可以选择你的脚步特效  第三地可以选择你的地图，地图内一共有4个地图  第四 详细战斗规则看下面第四步详解

一开始，你将会传送到你选择的地图，追杀者将获得5秒失明+缓慢。
当然，如果求生者生存超过3分钟，则求生者胜利！
求生者死后，将可以选择回到大厅或者旁观模式。
